articles.title: DPRK Delegate Clarifies DPRK's Stand on UN Mission
articles.content:
DPRK Delegate Clarifies DPRK's Stand on UN Mission
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegate clarified the principled stand of the DPRK government on the main mission of the UN at the meeting of the Sixth Committee of the 72nd Session of UN General Assembly on October 10.
					 What is the most important for the UN is to respect the purposes and principles of the UN defined in its Charter in order to strengthen the UN Charter and the role of the Organization, the delegate said, and went on:
					
					 Equality stands for all countries regardless of their size or level of development and no country has the right to violate other country's sovereignty. This is the very core of the purposes and principles of the UN.
					
					 To this end, it is of crucial importance for the UN Security Council to fully abide by the UN purposes and principled defined by its Charter.
					
					 However, the actual conducts of the UNSC are far from what is being required by the UN Charter and, in fact, the UNSC is wantonly violating the UN Charter.
					
					 The issue of the Korean peninsula is one of the most typical examples.
					
					 The UNSC had never taken issue with the U.S. which has posed a nuclear threat to the DPRK for more than half a century, but on the contrary, it termed the DPRK's measures to bolster its self-defensive nuclear force as "a threat to world peace and security" and cooked up illegal and unreasonable "resolutions" one after another.
					
					 The issue of the "UN Command" present in south Korea is another vivid example of the U.N. being misused against the UN Charter.
					
					 The "UN Command" rigged up by the U.S. with its provocation of the Korean War is a totally illegal entity which has nothing to do with UN except for its name stolen, neither is it involved in the UN's programs and activities nor its control and maintenance is related to the UN in any way.
					
					 In other words, the U.S. troops in south Korea do wear the UN berets, but they never report or answer to the UN or take orders from it. The so-called "UN Forces" in south Korea revealed its unlawfulness from the very moment of its foundation.
					
					 If the UNSC were to fulfill its primary mission and responsibility for international peace and security as required by the UN Charter, it should quit being a plaything of arbitrary and high-handed practices and the unilateralism of the U.S. and it should take due measures to peacefully resolve the issue of the Korean peninsula strictly in line with the purposes and principles of the UN.

articles.title: Statement of DPRK Delegate at Third Committee, 72nd Session of UNGA
articles.content:
Statement of DPRK Delegate at Third Committee, 72nd Session of UNGA
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The DPRK permanent representative to the United Nations stated at the Third Committee, the 72nd Session of the UN General Assembly on agenda item "Rights of Children" on Wednesday.
					 It is the consistent and unwavering stand of the DPRK to set the protection and promotion of the rights of the children as one of the primary principles of the State activities and to provide them with the best of everything, he said, and went on:
					
					 Over the past 70 years since its founding, the DPRK has creditably fulfilled its duty and role as the protector of the rights of the child through providing in its Constitution the issue of protecting the rights of the child and adopting a number of national and social welfare policies.
					
					 I avail myself of this opportunity to call your attention to the grave challenges faced by the DPRK in protecting the rights of children due to the sanctions imposed by the U.S. and other hostile forces, including those of the UN Security Council. 
					
					 As you are aware, it is the children in any country that are the most vulnerable to economic blockade and sanction. 
					
					 The persistent and vicious blockade and sanction against the DPRK are not only hampering the endeavors for promotion and protection of the rights of the children but also seriously threatening their right to survival. 
					
					 Currently, such sanctions are giving negative impact not only to the production of textbooks and school materials but also to the production sectors for child nutrition.
					
					 Moreover, most of the cooperation activities between the DPRK and child-related international organizations and humanitarian actors are shrinking in scope or prohibited.
					
					 Such inhumane sanctions against the DPRK constitute despicable violations of the ideal of humanitarianism and the spirit of the Convention on the Right of Child. They must be lifted without any conditions and without delay.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves to Attend WFYS
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves to Attend WFYS
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegation of youth and students headed by Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League, left here on Thursday to participate in the 19th World Festival of Youth and Students due in Sochi, Russia.

articles.title: TASS Delegation Flies Back
articles.content:
TASS Delegation Flies Back
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Russia's TASS led by Director General Sergei Mikhailov flew back on Thursday.
					 During its stay, KCNA Director General Kim Chang Gwang and Director General Sergei Mikhailov discussed the issue of further developing the exchange and cooperation between the two agencies.

articles.title: President of ITF Departs
articles.content:
President of ITF Departs
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Ri Yong Son, president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation and chairman of the International Martial Arts Games Committee, left here on Thursday.

articles.title: Meeting Held to Mark Anniversaries of Revolutionary Schools
articles.content:
Meeting Held to Mark Anniversaries of Revolutionary Schools
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School marked their 70th founding anniversaries.
					 President Kim Il Sung personally designated the site for the former under a plan for building the school for children of the revolutionary martyrs after Korea's liberation and declared its founding on Oct. 12, Juche 36 (1947).
					
					 Anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk made sure that the statue of the President was erected at the school for the first time in Korea and instilled into the hearts of the children of the revolutionary martyrs the faith that they should only believe in and follow the President.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il visited the venue of the opening ceremony of the school together with the President and Kim Jong Suk 70 years ago and since then gave field guidance to the two schools dozens of times to develop the schools into the highest seats of training the children of the revolutionary martyrs, where a revolutionary outlook on the leader was firmly established.
					
					 A commemoration meeting was held at April 25 House of Culture on Thursday.
					
					 Present there were Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and director of the KPA General Political Bureau, Pak Kwang Ho and Thae Jong Su, members of the Political Bureau and vice-chairmen of the C.C., WPK, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters Kim Chol Man and Ri Yong Suk and officials, teaching staff and students of the schools and their graduates.
					
					 A congratulatory message of the C.C., WPK to the teaching staff and students of the schools was conveyed at the meeting.
					
					 The message said the teaching staff, students and graduates of the schools have firmly safeguarded the Party and the leader in the van in the annals of victory and glory, learning from the tradition of loyalty and example of defending the leader unto death which were created in the forests of Mt Paektu and displayed in the war flames by the revolutionary forerunners.
					
					 The WPK Central Committee is convinced that all the teaching staff, students and graduates of the schools will creditably play a leading role in the sacred struggle for the final victory of the Juche revolution as befitting the revolutionary soldiers of the great Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea who have grown up learning the revolutionary spirit of Paektu and soul of Mangyongdae, the message noted.
					
					 Hwang Pyong So said in a report that the two schools are the revolutionary schools of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un, which were born and developed under their care, and the eternal embrace of love for the children of the revolutionary martyrs.
					
					 The schools have trained the children to be sons and daughters of Mangyongdae and Paektusan for the past 70 years under the leadership and loving care of the great persons, the reporter noted.
					
					 Thanks to such backbones intensely loyal to the Party's cause as graduates from the schools, the Korean revolution is always emerging victorious under the banner of socialism despite all ordeals and hardships of history, he stressed.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 The speakers renewed the resolve to carry through the tasks set forth in the congratulatory message of the Party Central Committee and reliably shoulder the future of the great era of Kim Jong Un by firmly preserving the lifeline of the Juche revolution.

articles.title: Stamps Issued to Mark 70th Anniversary of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School
articles.content:
Stamps Issued to Mark 70th Anniversary of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea issued new stamps (two sheets and one sheetlet) to commemorate the 70th anniversary of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School.
					 Seen on the stamps are letters "70th Anniversary of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School", "Juche 36 (1947)-Juche 106 (2017)" and the badge for graduates of the school.
					
					 A sheet depicting the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at Mangyongdae Revolutionary School shows the exploits of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 Another sheet depicting a photo of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un among students of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School represents the appearance of successors to revolution growing to be backbones of the Songun revolution.
					
					 A sheetlet reflects the pledge of vanguard fighters of the revolution to reliably carry forward the bloodline of Mangyongdae and Mt Paektu true to the guidance of the respected Supreme Leader.

articles.title: Mangyongdae Revolutionary School
articles.content:
Mangyongdae Revolutionary School
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- 70 years have passed after Mangyongdae Revolutionary School for bereaved children of revolutionary martyrs was founded in the DPRK.
					 The school in Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, was built under the sponsorship of the President.
					
					 Despite the claims of his busy life after the liberation of Korea from Japan's colonial rule, he took measures to find out helpless bereaved children of revolutionary martyrs and bring all of them to the school, and declared the foundation of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School on October 12, Juche 36(1947).
					
					 After its foundation, he often visited the school and took warm care of bereaved children and spent holidays with them.
					
					 Anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk also showed great affection for them, while paying deep attention to every aspect of their living from uniform to diet, in order to bring up them to be pillars of the country capable of succeeding to the Juche revolution.
					
					 Even in the period of the Arduous March, the forced march, the children at Mangyongdae Revolutionary School had led a happy life under the warm care of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 On the morning of New Year's Day in 1997, he visited the school to show paternal love for them. And he sent the historic letter "Mangyongdae Revolutionary School Is the Training Centre of the Backbone that will Succeed to the Juche Blood" on the occasion of its 50th founding anniversary.
					
					 Today the school shines resplendently as the one and only revolutionary school in the world under the care of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 In January 2012 when visiting the school, Kim Jong Un said that he came to the school before anything else to see the children at the school who were ardently missing for Kim Jong Il, and showed paternal love for them.
					
					 He paid a visit to the school again on the Tree-planting Day of this year and said that the school is the one of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, every corner of which is closely associated with their loving care for children, and the children at the school are always present in his mind.
					
					 Indeed, the 70 year-long history of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School is the one of the great loving care shown by the peerless great men who have brought up the bereaved children of revolutionary fighters to be reliable pillars of the country.

articles.title: Russian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, Thursday hosted a reception on the 69th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and the Russian Federation.
					 Present there on invitation were Sin Hong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Kwang Gun, vice-minister of External Economic Relations, So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is chairman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association, Mun Jae Chol, vice general director of the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps, and officials concerned.
					
					 Staff members of the Russian embassy here were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Thai Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Thai Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand led by Chairman Songchit Pullarp visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary career of the President at the old home, the visitors looked round historic relics.
					
					 The delegation also toured the Korean Revolution Museum, the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Monument to Party Founding, the Okryu Children's Hospital, etc.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan Thursday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on.
					The delegation laid bunches of flowers at the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Foreign Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Foreign Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Indonesian Ambassador to the DPRK Bambang Hiendrasto and his embassy officials did a friendship labor at the DPRK-Indonesia Friendship Yaksu Co-op Farm in Kangso District, Nampho City on Thursday. 
					 They went round a room dedicated to the history of the farm associated with the leadership exploits of the peerlessly great persons before helping farmers in harvesting and threshing.
					
					 On the same day, Cambodian Ambassador to the DPRK Sin Bunthoeurn and his embassy officials did a friendship labor at the DPRK-Cambodian Friendship Paeksok Co-op Farm in Sinchon County, South Hwanghae Province.
					
					 They helped farmers in rice harvesting.
					
					 The Indonesian and Cambodian embassy officials handed over aid materials to the farms.

articles.title: Network System for Sci-tech Dissemination Established
articles.content:
Network System for Sci-tech Dissemination Established
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The Sci-Tech Complex in the DPRK has recently established a nationwide network system for sci-tech dissemination, as part of the efforts to integrate and systemize the knowledge resources of the country.
					 This system enables subscribers to get access to sci-tech database, take part in sci-tech discussions, exchange successes and experience, import technologies and purchase products.
					
					 It is now playing an important role in cohering scientific research to production and making all the people well versed in science and technology, as it links the complex to sci-tech dissemination rooms across the country.
					
					 According to Ri Song Gyu, section chief of the complex, the number of subscribers is on the daily increase.
					
					 This year alone, over 60 million sci-tech data have been distributed throughout the country to be conducive to the technological development of relevant units and intellectual improvement of subscribers.

articles.title: Nothing Can Break Faith and Will of DPRK to Accomplish State Nuclear Force
articles.content:
Nothing Can Break Faith and Will of DPRK to Accomplish State Nuclear Force
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and its vassal forces make desperate efforts to block the advance of the DPRK as they are frightened by the high spirit and rapid advance of Juche Korea dashing ahead toward the final goal of rounding off the state nuclear force, Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Nothing can break the invincible faith and indomitable will of the army and people of the DPRK to surely achieve the goal of accomplishing the state nuclear force without any vacillation despite manifold hardships and ordeals.
					
					 Now Juche Korea is demonstrating its might as a world military power equipped with latest striking means including ICBM, H-bomb and ballistic missile of strategic submarine. This proud reality is the brilliant fruition of the faith and will of the army and people of the DPRK who stand unfazed by any sanctions, pressure and military threats and blackmail by the enemies.
					
					 Steadfast is our resolution to add to the hard-won victories despite manifold obstacles no matter how desperately the hostile forces may challenge.
					
					 The U.S. vicious moves will force the DPRK to put spurs to the drive for accomplishing the state nuclear force and it is the steadfast stand of our army and people to attain the goal without fail.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers will witness how the DPRK makes all their persistent sanctions and blockade go belly-up and achieve the final goal of perfecting the state nuclear force.
					
					 The final victory is in store for the Korean army and people with indomitable faith and tremendous self-development capability.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean anti-DPRK Human Rights Smear Campaign
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean anti-DPRK Human Rights Smear Campaign
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean puppet ministry of Unification made public the "2017 execution plan" pursuant to the "main plan for improving human rights in the north". In the plan they laid down "seven point tasks to be implemented" peppered with very provocative phraseologies against the DPRK while talking about the "improvement of human rights in the north".
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Thursday says it is very dangerous that the south Korean puppet forces are escalating confrontation and tension while trumpeting about "human rights in the north" at a time when the situation on the Korean peninsula is getting tenser.
					
					 It is a vicious challenge to the dignified DPRK and an unpardonable mockery of its people that the south Korean puppet forces are running high fever in provoking it while building up public opinion over "human rights issue in the north", the commentary notes, and says:
					
					 They are kicking up "human rights" campaign against the DPRK, adding to the crimes they have already committed, not content with getting frantic in the moves for a nuclear war and sanctions against it as running dogs of the U.S.
					
					 They would be well advised to mind their own business before finding fault with others.
					
					 South Korea has long been turned into the world's worst tundra of human rights and veritable hell due to the dictatorial politics and unpopular rule of the successive puppet ruling quarters.
					
					 The poor human rights situation remains unchanged in south Korea.
					
					 It is the height of shame for those working hard to do harm to the dignity and system of the DPRK over non-existent "human rights issue" to call for "dialogue".
					
					 The puppet forces should stop behaving recklessly, mindful that they will be punished when they dream about the collapse of the DPRK's socialist system in which the people's dream and ideal are becoming reality.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Warned Not to Distract Public Opinion
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Warned Not to Distract Public Opinion
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Jo Nam Su issued a commentary titled "Public Opinion Should Not Be Distracted with Rubbish of 'Simultaneous Development of Sanctions and Pressure and Dialogue'".
					 The commentary says:
					
					 The south Korean authorities are peddling the theory of "simultaneous development of sanctions and pressure and dialogue", claiming that it is the unique way of settling the present serious situation getting all the more acute with each passing moment.
					
					 This is contradictory and sheer sophism bereft of reason in the light of their literal meaning only.
					
					 As for the "dialogue" through "sanctions and pressure" touted by the south Korean authorities, it is just foolish ambition to bring down the DPRK by the use of coercive means and methods.
					
					 The north-south relations plunged into a stalemate and the situation on the Korean peninsula has reached the extremes. This is a product of the traitorous acts of the despicable south Korean authorities who go in cahoots with the U.S. and stand in the way of dialogue and peace while dreaming a foolish dream of depriving the DPRK of its nuclear treasured sword.
					
					 Their assertion is just a poor excuse to cover up their confrontation nature and their stand of kowtowing to the U.S. line, and justify the situation inching close to the war of aggression against the north.
					
					 They are seriously mistaken if they think they can find a way-out while currying favor with the U.S. and making sheep's eyes at the DPRK through such a clumsy theory.
					
					 They should bear in mind that the final destination of the sanctions and pressure will be do-or-die final battle in which everything has to be settled at the cost of blood, not any "dialogue" expected by them.
					
					 Clear is the result if they take part in doing harm to their fellow countrymen in collusion with outsiders in wanton violation of the agreement common to the nation which they made with their own hands for fear of the U.S.
					
					 They should stand against outsiders' hostile policy toward the DPRK from the sincere stand of By Our Nation Itself and make an independent and righteous option for peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula, not kowtowing to the U.S. line and clamoring for foolish theory of "simultaneous development of sanctions and pressure and dialogue", though belatedly, if they do not want to be fallen into the abyss of death in return for their foolish and traitorous pursuance of the U.S.

articles.title: U.S. Imperialists Massively Hurl Strategic Assets into S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Imperialists Massively Hurl Strategic Assets into S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists are reportedly running amuck in their war moves to militarily stifle the DPRK by keeping introducing strategic assets into south Korea and its vicinity.
					 A formation of B-1B took off Guam on Tuesday and conducted a drill for preemptive strike on the DPRK in the sky of East Sea of Korea at night.
					
					 It also staged another drill for striking land targets over the West Sea under the cover of the puppet air force.
					
					 Pointing to the drills, Chongwadae of south Korea declared that those were pursuant to the consultation made with the U.S. to escalate the rotation deployment of strategic assets.
					
					 On the same day, a mine sweeper of the U.S. Navy entered Pusan Port to pave a marine route for invading the north.
					
					 Earlier on Oct. 7, an ultra-modern attack nuclear submarine of the U.S. entered Jinhae Port. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the U.S. imperialist warmongers are mulling amassing nuclear carrier task forces in Western Pacific.
					
					 Nuclear carrier Theodore Roosevelt task force left a base in the U.S. mainland on Oct. 6. The task force is reportedly to stage a war maneuver in the operation area of the 7th and 5th fleets of the U.S. Navy.
					
					 The U.S. is contemplating sending Ronald Reagan task force for a joint military rehearsal with the puppet navy in the East Sea of Korea soon.

articles.title: S. Korea: Middle Schoolers Commit Suicide
articles.content:
Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean CBS on October 8, two first-year children of the middle school committed suicide in Tonggu and Ulju County of Ulsan City in June and July last.
					 They had been assaulted by their classmates.

articles.title: Gun-related Accidents on Increase in S. Korea
articles.content:
Gun-related Accidents on Increase in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Gun-related accidents have been on increase in south Korea, throwing people into horror and uneasiness, according to KBS on Oct. 8.
					 The gun-related accidents numbered more than 70 till August this year from 2012.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report to Party Congress off Press in Romania
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report to Party Congress off Press in Romania
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on the work of the Central Committee was brought out in booklet by the Socialist Party of Romania.
					 Its releasing ceremony took place on October 5.
					
					 The chairman of the Romanian party said:
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Un in his report proudly reviewed the whole course of the WPK which has demonstrated its victory only, holding aloft the banner of Juche and Songun and indicated concrete tasks arising in accomplishing the socialist cause and realizing the independent reunification of Korea and independence of the world.
					
					 Every paragraph of the report represents his iron will to put the DPRK on the status of a powerful nation by modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism through the brilliant embodiment of the idea and cause of the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and to bring about the victory of the global cause of independence, united close with the peoples of all countries advocating independence.
					
					 We wish the army and people of the DPRK greater success in a drive to carry out the tasks set forth by the Seventh Party Congress.

articles.title: WPK Lauded in Different Countries
articles.content:
WPK Lauded in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Media of different countries gave special write-ups to the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as the general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and its 72nd birthday between September 26 and October 5.
					 The Indian paper Indian and World Event devoted one whole page to an article titled "Ever-victorious WPK" with a photo of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The article elaborated on the fact that the WPK guided by the great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is a party in which the steel-like unity and cohesion of all its members has been established.
					
					 The Indian newspaper New Delhi Times in an article titled "People's Country" introduced the reality of the DPRK where all rights and dignity of the people are fully guaranteed.
					
					 The Bangladesh newspaper Daily Nauroz in an article titled "Immortal Party Building Feats" praised Kim Jong Il for having built up the WPK into an ever-victorious party in realizing the cause of socialism and independence.
					
					 The Iranian news Ilna also noted that Kim Jong Il had developed the WPK into an ideologically pure entity, an integral organization and a party which achieved the unity of actions.
					
					 The Pakistani paper Election Times said in an article titled "Invincibility of WPK and Will of Korean People" that the main factor of the WPK's invincibility lies in the guiding idea, the steel-like unity and the absolute support and trust of the popular masses.

articles.title: U.S. Chief Executive's Anti-DPRK Remarks Censured Abroad
articles.content:
U.S. Chief Executive's Anti-DPRK Remarks Censured Abroad
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Rallies, Roundtable talks and lecture meetings took place in Guinea, Nigeria and Russia from September 25 to 30 to reject the reckless remarks of the U.S. chief executive calling for "total destruction" of the DPRK.
					 The chairman of the Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea said in a speech that Trump's talk about the total destruction of the DPRK shed light to the height of infamy of the U.S., adding:
					
					 The war maniac fond of playing with fire like Trump should be tamed only with fire.
					
					 Trump should get back to his senses and roll back the hostile policy toward the DPRK and withdraw the U.S. aggression forces from south Korea.
					
					 The chairman of the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association said that the invective of Trump is arousing strong rebuff and criticism from the peace-loving progressives, stating that if Trump ignites a new war against the DPRK, it will end in the ruin of the U.S., empire of evil.
					
					 The secretary of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and other figures termed the reckless remarks of Trump an open revelation of the wolfish nature to hold hegemony seized by "America first". And they stressed that the world community came to clearly and again know who is responsible for escalating tension on Korean peninsula through his outbursts.
					
					 They warned that Trump would have to pay a high price unless he refuses to apologize to Korean people for his remarks.

articles.title: Representante coreano interviene en 6o comite de 72a sesion de la Asamblea General de la ONU
articles.content:
Representante coreano interviene en 6o comite de 72a sesion de la Asamblea General de la ONU
Pyongyang, 12 de octubre (ACNC) -- El representante coreano aclaro el dia 10 la posicion de principios de la RPDC sobre la mision principal de la ONU en la reunion del 6o comite de la 72a sesion de la Asamblea General de la ONU.
					Lo mas importante en afianzar la Carta de la ONU y mejorar su papel es imperioso que esta organizacion internacional respete su meta y principios estipulados por la Carta en todas sus actividades, adelanto el y prosiguio:
					
					Existen en este mundo los paises pequenos y los grandes y los paises desarrollados y otros en vias de desarrollo. Pero, todos ellos son iguales y ninguno puede violar la soberania de otro, lo que es el fundamento de la meta y los principios de la ONU.
					
					El asunto muy importante desde tal punto de vista es que el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU actue de acuerdo con la meta y los principios de la ONU presentados en su Carta.
					
					Sin embargo, el CS de la ONU viola flagrantemente la Carta de la ONU actuando enajenado de sus demandas.
					
					El ejemplo mas tipico es el problema de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					El Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU nunca habia cuestionado a Estados Unidos que durante mas de medio siglo, vino ejerciendo la amenaza nuclear a la RPDC. Al contrario, viene fabricando las llamadas "resoluciones" describiendo las medidas de la RPDC para el aumento de sus fuerzas armadas nucleares de autodefensa como "amenaza a la paz y seguridad internacionales".
					
					Otro ejemplo es el caso de la "comandancia de las fuerzas de la ONU" ocupantes del suelo surcoreano, la cual ha funcionado en contrasentido a la Carta de la ONU.  
					
					Si bien esa "comandancia", fabricada por EE.UU cuando estallo la guerra coreana, abusa del nombre de la ONU, ella es el "aparato" nominal que no tiene nada que ver con la ONU tanto desde el punto de vista de cualquier actividad y plan de la ONU como a la luz de su control y mantenimiento.
					
					En otras palabras, las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del suelo surcoreano se ponen el casco de "fuerzas de la ONU", pero nunca habian presentado el informe a la ONU ni sometido al control o el mando de ella. Asi la "comandancia" ha revelado su naturaleza ilegal desde el momento de su aparicion en el mundo.
					
					Para cumplir su mision y papel de asegurar la paz y la seguridad internacionales segun la demanda de la Carta de la ONU, el Consejo de Seguridad debera tomar las medidas para solucionar de manera pacifica el problema de la Peninsula Coreana conforme a la meta y los principios de la ONU dejando de ser la victima del despotismo y arbitrariedades originados de unilateralismo de EE.UU.

articles.title: Representante coreano exige cancelar la sancion anti-RPDC en reunion de la ONU
articles.content:
Representante coreano exige cancelar la sancion anti-RPDC en reunion de la ONU
Pyongyang, 12 de octubre (ACNC) -- El representante permanente de la RPDC ante la ONU pronuncio el dia 11 un discurso durante el debate de la agenda "Derechos infantiles" en la reunion del 3o comite de la 72a sesion de la Asamblea General de la ONU.
					El senalo que el gobierno de la RPDC tiene la invariable posicion de conceder con preferencia todo lo mejor a los ninos considerando la proteccion y fomento de sus derechos como uno de los maximos principios de las actividades estatales.
					
					Continuo que desde el primer dia de su fundacion hasta hoy, la RPDC estipulo en la Constitucion el asunto de proteccion de derechos infantiles y aplico durante cerca de 70 anos las politicas estatales y sociales para su implementacion cumpliendo con responsabilidad la mision y papel de protectora de esos derechos.
					
					Llamo la atencion al hecho de que debido a la sancion anti-RPDC de las fuerzas hostiles, incluso Estados Unidos, y del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, las labores de proteccion de los derechos infantiles en la RPDC se enfrentan con graves desafios.
					
					En todos los paises la mayor victima del bloqueo y sancion economicos es precisamente la poblacion infantil, recalco y prosiguio:
					
					Las maniobras anti-RPDC perjudican no solo el desarrollo regular de la proteccion de los derechos infantiles, sino tambien la existencia de ninos.
					
					La produccion de los utensilios escolares inclusive los manuales y cuadernos y el dominio de produccion de los alimentos nutritivos para los ninos tropiezan ahora con graves dificultades debido a las brutales sanciones.
					
					Para colmo, se ocurren uno tras otro los fenomenos anormales que se interrumpen o se disminuyen casi todas las actividades cooperativas de las organizaciones internacionales y las entidades humanitarias internacionales relacionadas con la infancia con la RPDC.
					
					El representante coreano dio enfasis en que hay que retirarse incondicional e inmediatamente todas las sanciones antieticas e inhumanas anti-RPDC que se contravienen al ideal humanitario y al espiritu del convenio de derechos de ninos.

articles.title: Conmemoran el aniversario 70 de fundacion de las Escuelas Revolucionarias
articles.content:
Conmemoran el aniversario 70 de fundacion de las Escuelas Revolucionarias
Pyongyang, 12 de octubre (ACNC) -- Acogieron el aniversario 70 de su fundacion la Escuela Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae y la Escuela Revolucionaria Kang Pan Sok.
					 Despues de la liberacion de la patria, el Presidente Kim Il Sung propuso fundar una escuela para los hijos de los martires revolucionarios y fijo personalmente el terreno para su construccion.
					
					El 12 de octubre del 36 (1947) de la Era Juche, declaro a todo el mundo la constitucion de la Escuela Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae.
					
					 La Heroina de Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk hizo construir en esa escuela la primera estatua de bronce del Presidente para que los hijos de los martires revolucionarios tuvieran en el el unico sosten espiritual.
					
					 Hace 70 anos, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il asistio a la ceremonia de inauguracion de la escuela junto con el Presidente y la Heroina.
					
					Desde entonces, visito en decenas de ocasiones ambas escuelas revolucionarias para desarrollarlas como centros supremos de educacion a los hijos de martires revolucionarios donde se haya establecido firmemente la concepcion revolucionaria del lider.
					
					 El acto conmemorativo tuvo lugar el dia 12 en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril.
					
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el vicemariscal del Ejercito Popular de Corea Hwang Pyong So, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, Pak Kwang Ho y Thae Jong Su, miembros del BP y vicepresidentes del CC del PTC, los combatientes revolucionarios antijaponeses Kim Chol Man y Ri Yong Suk, los funcionarios, maestros, empleados, alumnos y graduados de las escuelas.
					
					  En el acto fue leido el mensaje de felicitacion del CC del PTC enviado a los maestros, empleados y alumnos de las escuelas.
					
					  El texto senalo que los maestros, empleados, alumnos y graduados de ambas escuelas defendieron en la primera linea al partido y al lider en las decadas de victorias y glorias introduciendo la tradicion de fidelidad y el ejemplo de defensa a ultranza al lider de los martires revolucionarios que se crearon en la selva del monte Paektu y se pusieron en pleno juego en el fragor de la guerra.
					
					  Enfatizo que el CC del PTC esta convencido de que todos ellos desempenaran magnificamente el papel medular en la sagrada lucha por lograr la victoria final de la revolucion del Juche como soldados revolucionarios de la Corea de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il que crecieron aprendiendo el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu y el de Mangyongdae.
					
					  En el informe de la ocasion, Hwang Pyong So apunto que la Escuela Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae y la Escuela Revolucionaria Kang Pan Sok son las de Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il y Kim Jong Un, que nacieron y se desarrollaron bajo la atencion y direccion de estos grandes hombres sin iguales, y las cunas de amor para los hijos de martires revolucionarios.
					
					  Bajo la direccion y atencion de los grandes hombres sin pares, ambas instituciones docentes formaron durante 70 anos pasados a sus alumnos como excelentes hijos de Mangyongdae y del monte Paektu, recordo.
					
					  La revolucion coreana sale victoriosa bajo la bandera del socialismo superando todas las pruebas y dificultades de la historia gracias a los cuadros pilares, fieles a la causa del partido, como los graduados de las escuelas, senalo.
					
					  Seguidamente, hubo discursos.
					
					  Los oradores expresaron la decision de cumplir cabalmente las tareas presentadas en el mensaje de felicitacion del CC del PTC y hacerse cargo del futuro de la epoca de Kim Jong Un continuando con firmeza el linaje de la revolucion del Juche.

articles.title: Jo Nam Su comenta el chisme de "simultanear sancion y presion con dialogo"
articles.content:
Jo Nam Su comenta el chisme de "simultanear sancion y presion con dialogo"
Pyongyang, 12 de octubre (ACNC) -- Jo Nam Su publico un comentario titulado "No se debe enturbiar la opinion publica con la chismografia de 'simultanear la sancion y presion con el dialogo'".
					 Las autoridades surcoreanas hablan ahora como si esa doctrina enganosa fuera el unico remedio para reparar la actual coyuntura de crisis que va de mal en peor, adelanta el autor y prosigue:
					
					 Ya desde su sentido literal, 'simultanear la sancion y presion con el dialogo' es un sofisma contradictorio e ilogico.
					
					 El "dialogo" mediante la "sancion y presion", aludido por las autoridades surcoreanas, no es mas que la absurda ilusion de poner de rodillas a la RPDC mediante los medios y metodos coercitivos.
					
					  Las relaciones N-S se empeoran cada dia mas y la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana cayo en la fase extremada. Esto es un producto de los sucios actos traidores de las autoridades surcoreanas que impiden el camino por el dialogo y la paz sonando con eliminar el remedio nuclear de la RPDC en cooperacion con EE.UU.
					
					  Es decir, esta doctrina es una propaganda bagatela para enganar la opinion publica y la cortina de humo para disimular su atributo conflictivo y actitud servil a EE.UU. y justificar sus actos peligrosos que acarrean la guerra de agresion al Norte de Corea.
					
					  Seria un error fatal si las autoridades surcoreanas piensan que podrian buscar la salvacion congraciandose con EE.UU. y dando el gesto halagueno a la RPDC con esa chismografia. 
					
					Ellas deben tener bien presente que el cabo de sancion y presion no es el "dialogo", que ellas esperan, sino la batalla final en que se ajustaran las cuentas de lo todo con sangre en vez de palabras.
					
					Es evidente el destino de ellas si se incorporan hasta el final en la ofensiva contra la misma nacion en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras rompiendo, por el temor a EE.UU., hasta los acuerdos comunes de la nacion que firmaron ellas mismas.
					
					Si no quieren caer en el abismo de muerte como resultado de su absurda y vendepatria sumision a EE.UU., las autoridades surcoreanas no deben anunciar mas el chisme de "simultanear la sancion y presion con el dialogo", sino rechazar la politica anti-RPDC de las fuerzas extranjeras a partir de la posicion de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" y tomar una opcion independiente y justa por la paz y la reunificacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
